scripts.install:backend: cd backend && npm ci --progress=false --loglevel=error || cd backend && npm install
scripts.install:frontend: cd frontend && npm ci --progress=false --loglevel=error || cd frontend && npm install
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run copy:dist
scripts.copy:dist: mkdir -p dist && cp -r backend/dist dist/backend && cp -r frontend/build dist/frontend
